text: Aidenfield is a suburb of Christchurch. The land was owned by Good Shepherd Sisters from 1886 to 2001. It is located between State Highway 75 & State Highway 76 (Christchurch Southern Motorway) and is 8 kilometers from the Christchurch city centre. The name of the suburb was approved in January 2001. The Aidanfield Christian School is located in the suburb. ==References== Category:Suburbs of Christchurch
title: Aidanfield
